name: Recipe: Meat Lover's Mushroom Pizza
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Meat Lover's Mushroom Pizza.

value.name: Raw Meat
value.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

value.name: Flour
value.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

value.name: Mushroom
value.desc: Hardy common fungi. Can grow anywhere with the right amount of shade and moisture.

value.name: Cheese
value.desc: Made from fermented milk. High in energy, it's used in a wide range of dishes.

value.name: Meat Lover's Mushroom Pizza
value.desc: A pizza freshly baked from the oven. The crust is dotted with large chunks of meat and fresh mushroom slices. The sweet, stretchy cheese further adds to the charm. You have no doubt that every slice will be snatched away the moment it is served. Speed, therefore, is a gourmet's best buddy when this pizza is on the table.

value.text: In-game Mail Reward sent on August 29, 2022
